devices.name: Ace
devices.description: YU Ace Android smartphone. Announced Aug 2018. Features 5.45″ display, MT6739WW chipset, 4000 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 3 GB RAM.

devices.name: Yureka 2
devices.description: YU Yureka 2 Android smartphone. Announced Sep 2017. Features 5.5″ display, Snapdragon 625 chipset, 16 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 3930 mAh battery, 64 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, To be confirmed.

devices.name: Yunique 2
devices.description: YU Yunique 2 Android smartphone. Announced Jul 2017. Features 5.0″ display, MT6737 chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 5 MP front camera, 2500 mAh battery, 16 GB storage, 2 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 3.

devices.name: Yureka Black
devices.description: YU Yureka Black Android smartphone. Announced Jun 2017. Features 5.0″ display, Snapdragon 430 chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 3000 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 4 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 3.

devices.name: Yunique Plus
devices.description: YU Yunique Plus Android smartphone. Announced Aug 2016. Features 4.7″ display, Snapdragon 410 chipset, 8 MP primary camera, 2 MP front camera, 2000 mAh battery, 8 GB storage, 2 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 3.

devices.name: Yureka S
devices.description: YU Yureka S Android smartphone. Announced Aug 2016. Features 5.2″ display, Snapdragon 615 chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 5 MP front camera, 3000 mAh battery, 16 GB storage, 3 GB RAM, Corning Gorilla Glass 3.

devices.name: Yunicorn
devices.description: YU Yunicorn Android smartphone. Announced May 2016. Features 5.5″ display, MT6755 Helio P10 chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 5 MP front camera, 4000 mAh battery, 32 GB storage, 4 GB RAM.

devices.description: YU Yureka Note Android smartphone. Announced Apr 2016. Features 6.0″ display, MT6753 chipset, 13 MP primary camera, 8 MP front camera, 4000 mAh battery, 16 GB storage, 3 GB RAM, Corning Concore Glass 3.

devices.name: Yutopia
